input.sentences: our costume party was a blast ! lots of friends came !
the choices of costumes was sometimes extreme !
we enjoyed getting our photos taken .
a lot of silliness happens when people dress up !
output.sentences: Three girls have fun getting ready for a costume party.
They're showing off their creative costumes.
Their friends show up and take pictures.
They adjust their costumes ass they pose.
Their friend makes a joke about cutting the guy up.
